import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Container,Col,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import{useParams,useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderProduct=()=>{const{drinkId}=useParams();const[drink,setDrink]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();// Fetch drink data from API
